top.title: Hurricane death toll rises as Jamaica aid effort struggles
top.summary: The devastating storm claimed nearly 50 lives when it swept Haiti and Jamaica this week.

top.title: More than 60,000 flee Sudanese city after its capture by RSF militia, says UN
top.summary: El-Fasher is under the control of paramilitaries accused of mass executions and crimes against humanity.

top.title: South Africa hits back at US refugee plan to favour white Afrikaners
top.summary: Pretoria rubbishes claims of a white genocide and quotes prominent Afrikaners who dub Trump's plans racist.

top.title: Pornhub says UK visitors down 77% since age checks came in
top.summary: The site tells BBC News it believes people are viewing riskier sites - but they may just be using VPNs.

top.title: Security concerns over system at heart of digital ID
top.summary: The government is facing questions over whether One Login can be trusted to keep people's personal data secure.

top.title: Watchdog slams O2 over unexpected price rise
top.summary: The media regulator said it was disappointed O2 raised prices more than was advertised when customers took out contracts.
